name: diana hafely
text: Stop skimping on the toppings and sauce! This is the second time our pizza lacked the right amount of sauce and toppings - it was nearly dry - and each piece barely had 2 pieces of pepperoni on it. Also, it looked like a child cut the pizza. Some pieces were super tiny and some were 2 pieces in one.

name: Jamison Fennel
text: Clean place. Nice decor. Food is average for pizza hut.nice place to sit and relax. I've never seen this place overly busy. They play great music ..

name: Aura Deibel
text: The pizza was over an hour to deliver. When I called I was hung up on then the tracker updated to out for delivery. Which took another 20 minutes. And the pizza was barely warm by the time it finally arrived.

Also i got wings & there was so much cajun on there, they were totally UNEDIBLE & very small...
